text: Christina Schollin (born Christina Alma Elisabet Schollin; 26 December 1937) is a Swedish actress. She is best known for her roles in Dear John, Song of Norway and Ingmar Bergman's Fanny and Alexander. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Swedish voice actors Category:Actors from Stockholm
title: Christina Schollin
